name: core-item
description: `core-item` is a simple line-item object: a label and/or an icon that can also act as a link. Example: To use as a link, put <a> element in the item. Example:

src.name: src
src.description: The URL of an image for the icon.

icon.name: icon
icon.description: Specifies the icon from the Polymer icon set.

label.name: label
label.description: Specifies the label for the menu item.
